Measure/Dataset Description: Corresponds to the monthly growth rate of the normalised consumer confidence indicator (CCI), computed as the average of: i) financial situation over the past 12 months , ii) financial situation over the next 12 months, iii) the general economic situation over the next 12 months and iv) major purchases over the 12 next months
Adjusted to ensure that its cyclical amplitude on average agrees with that of detruded reference series
Area Available: Australia, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Korea, Mexico, Spain, Türkiye, UK, US, Major four European countries, G7, G20, Brazil, China, India, Indonesia, South Africa, Major five Asia economies, NAFTA

Measure/Dataset Description: Based on three-month money market rates where available. Short-term interest rates are the rates at which short-term borrowings are effected between financial institutions or the rate at which short-term government paper is issued or traded in the market
Area Available: All OECD members (missing Turkiye), Brazil, Bulgaria, China, Croatia, India, Indonesia, Romania, Russia, South Africa
